issue.title: [C++] AsofJoinNode support for Boolean data field
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-18342](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-18342). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This is to add boolean data field support to asof join as proposed here: https://github.com/westonpace/arrow/pull/24

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-18342?focusedCommentId=17635545) by Weston Pace (westonpace):*
Issue resolved by pull request 14658
